attributes.action: Trace ‘missing’ non-resident parents via there national insurance number, if the tax man can claim his money why cant the children
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: why should a child who is brought up in a single parent family do without when the tax man is claiming money from the missing parent. we all have national insurance numbers and instead of the CSA saying they cannot trace the parent why does the government not take action and claim Child support with tax. These children should not be forgotton by anyone.
